info.title: getTransactions example
info.description: This is an API example for getTransactions, a method to retrieve transaction history for a specific address on the TON blockchain.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to get transactions for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of transactions to return

parameters.name: to_lt
parameters.description: The logical time to start the search from (0 means from the latest)

parameters.name: archival
parameters.description: Whether to use archival node for the query

200.description: Transaction history for the specified address

lt.description: The logical time of the transaction

fee.description: The fee for the transaction in nanotons

storage_fee.description: The storage fee for the transaction in nanotons

other_fee.description: Other fees for the transaction in nanotons
